statements: SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date = '2021-12-01';
SELECT disclosure_id, employee_name, position FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE position LIKE '%Manager%';
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY disclosure_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE employee_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT position, disclosure_date FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE position = 'Manager' AND disclosure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT employee_name, position, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE position LIKE '%Associate%' ORDER BY disclosure_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT disclosure_id, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY date_disclosed DESC;
SELECT employee_id, count(*) AS disclosure_count FROM conflicts_of_interest GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM disclosures WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT disclosure_id, date_submitted, reviewer_id FROM disclosures ORDER BY date_submitted ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT disclosure_id, employee_id, date_disclosed FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE date_disclosed >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY disclosure_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM disclosures WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(disclosure_id) AS total_disclosures FROM disclosures GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_disclosures > 2
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY conflict_description ASC;
SELECT id, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) FROM conflicts_of_interest GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT full_name, email FROM employees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employees WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, conflict_description, disclosure_date FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email, department FROM employees JOIN disclosure_reviews ON employees.employee_id = disclosure_reviews.reviewer_id ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures;
SELECT disclosure_id, disclosure_text FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE employee_id=100;
SELECT employee_id, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM conflict_types WHERE type_name='Financial';
SELECT employee_id, conflict_type_id, relationship_status FROM employee_conflict_relationship ORDER BY rel_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest_disclosures WHERE disclosure_date = '2022-04-15';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT type_name FROM conflict_types WHERE type_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM employee_conflict_relationship WHERE relationship_status = 'Active' ORDER BY employee_id ASC, conflict_type_id DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, c.type_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_conflict_relationship r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id INNER JOIN conflict_types c ON r.conflict_type_id = c.type_id;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT DISTINCT reviewer_id FROM disclosure_reviews;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department = 'Legal' ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT conflict_description, employee_name FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE disclosure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY department, disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date, comments FROM disclosure_reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-06-15' ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.id = departments.manager_id WHERE departments.department_name = 'HR';
